module.title: DOM Manipulation
module.description: Select, modify, and interact with HTML elements using JavaScript

lessons.title: Selecting Elements
lessons.content:
# Essential to know
- `document.querySelector()` selects first match
- `document.querySelectorAll()` selects all matches
- Uses CSS selectors: `#id`, `.class`, `tag`
- `getElementById()` is faster for IDs

---

# Selecting Elements

lessons.title: Modifying the DOM
lessons.content:
# Essential to know
- `textContent` changes text
- `innerHTML` changes HTML (use with caution)
- `classList` adds/removes CSS classes
- `style` changes inline styles
- `setAttribute()` modifies attributes

---

# Modifying the DOM

lessons.title: Event Listeners
lessons.content:
# Essential to know
- `addEventListener(event, handler)` attaches events
- Common events: `click`, `input`, `submit`, `keydown`
- `event.preventDefault()` stops default behavior
- `event.target` is the element that triggered the event

---

# Event Listeners

lessons.title: Creating & Removing Elements
lessons.content:
# Essential to know
- `document.createElement()` creates new elements
- `parent.appendChild()` adds to DOM
- `element.remove()` removes from DOM
- Build dynamic UIs by creating elements in code

---
